descriptionHtml:
:::: Amiella Outfit CBBEv3M :::


	*** What is this ? ***
Remodeled [ Amiella Outfit - UNP and UNPB by.anano ] for CBBEv3M Body.
Arm equipment that is not included in an original as an additional factor is added.


	*** Change from an original ***
>Remodeled it for CBBEv3M Body.

>Added the arm equipment.

>I let setting of Node fit Remodeled Armor.
 Can wear it together without competing with separate parts of Remodeled Armor.
	[ Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M ] : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004


	*** Necessary Mod ***
[ Amiella Outfit - UNP and UNPB ] : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16424
	Only txture is necessary.


[ Caliente Female Body Mod BBE v3 ] : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
	texture for v3 is required.


	*** Recommended Mod ***
[ CBBEv3M Body Replacer : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13180 ]
	Because it is optimized by this figure, it is recommended if you wear parts except Clothes in a simple substance.


	*** Installation ***
After having installed an original, please overwrite in this Mod.
If you do not overwrite esp file, the arm equipment is not reflected. Please be careful!


	*** Credit ***
Mr. anano
Thank you for wonderful Mod!


	*** Video ***
mrkrossfaith made it for me. Thank you!
 [youtube]abyAy4k7WPQ[/youtube]


				by.MAK



 --- Answer to common question ---
Q. What does hairstyle MOD use?

A. Hairstyle MOD is
 [ Tera Hair Weight Fix version ]
	Because it is not a file uploaded in Nexus, please search it.


Q. What does face MOD use?

A. Face MOD is
 [ RANs HeadMesh Variants by RAN46 ]
	http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7127

 [ RANs Eyeliner Replacer by RAN46 ]
	http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5701

 [ envision Face by DD AKT ]
	http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7897
author: MAK
